== Xubuntu Website ==

The Xubuntu website needs to be redesigned, will be updated in advance of the release of Xubuntu 8.10, the Intrepid Ibex.  

=== Project Plan ===

* Xubuntu Website <nowiki>[[WebPlan|Project Plan]]</nowiki> 
* Website Team meeting schedule
** Every Tuesday at 1800 UTC, starting on July 22nd, in #xubuntu-devel on the Freenode IRC network.
